comment: Enjoyed the plot and characters, but found the writing style a bit dry.
Interesting premise, but the execution fell a bit flat for me.
Absolutely loved this book! The characters were so well-developed and the story was incredibly engaging.
Couldn't get into this one, unfortunately. The pacing was slow and I found myself losing interest.
This book was a rollercoaster of emotions - I laughed, I cried, and I couldn't put it down. Highly recommend!
